languages.text: Офицеры слишком измождены. По их поникшим головам и опущенным плечам видно, что каждое произнесенное Лорд-капитаном слово словно камнем придавливает их дух, а не помогает ему воспарить. Пристыженные собственной слабостью, они покидают медпалубу и обреченно плетутся к своим постам.

traits.locale_text: Офицеры слишком измождены. Каждое произнесенное капитаном слово только ухудшает их настрой. Пристыженные собственной слабостью, они покидают медпалубу и обреченно плетутся к своим постам.

languages.text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.
languages.original_text: Офицеры слишком измождены. По их поникшим головам и опущенным плечам видно, что каждое произнесенное Лорд-капитаном слово словно камнем придавливает их дух, а не помогает ему воспарить. Пристыженные собственной слабостью, они покидают медпалубу и обреченно плетутся к своим постам.

traits.locale_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word that the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle toward their stations in resignation.

Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle toward their stations in resignation.

Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

languages.text: Los oficiales están agotados. Sus caras alicaídas y hombros encorvados dejan claro que las palabras de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} no están levantando los ánimos, sino aplastándolos por completo. Avergonzados por su debilidad y resignados, abandonan la cubierta médica para acudir a sus puestos.
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales están agotados. Sus caras alicaídas y hombros encorvados dejan claro que las palabras de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} no están levantando los ánimos, sino aplastándolos por completo. Avergonzados por su debilidad y resignados, abandonan la cubierta médica para acudir a sus puestos.

languages.text: 军官们实在是太疲劳了。从他们气馁的表情与佝偻的肩膀不难看出，领主舰长的话并没有让他们打起精神，反而像巨石一样压垮了他们的士气。他们为自己的软弱感到羞愧，离开了医疗甲板，认命般地回到了各自的岗位。
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

traits.locale_text: 军官们实在是太疲劳了。从他们气馁的表情与佝偻的肩膀不难看出，领主舰长的话并没有让他们打起精神，反而像巨石一样压垮了他们的士气。他们为自己的软弱感到羞愧，离开了医疗甲板，认命般地回到了各自的岗位。

languages.text: 士官も疲れきっている。くたびれた表情と落ちていく肩を見れば、ロード・キャプテンの一言一言が彼らの精神を高めるどころか、岩のように砕いてしまうことが容易にわかった。士官達は自分達の弱さを恥じながらメディケアデッキを後にすると、諦めとともに足を引きずりながら自分達のステーションへと去って行った。
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

traits.locale_text: 士官も疲れきっている。くたびれた表情と落ちていく肩を見れば、ロード・キャプテンの一言一言が彼らの精神を高めるどころか、岩のように砕いてしまうことが容易にわかった。士官達は自分達の弱さを恥じながらメディケアデッキを後にすると、諦めとともに足を引きずりながら自分達のステーションへと去って行った。

languages.text: Die Offiziere sind zu erschöpft. An ihren gesenkten Köpfen und gebeugten Schultern ist unschwer zu erkennen, dass jedes Wort, das der Lord Captain sagt, ihren Geist wie einen Stein zerdrückt, anstatt ihm auf die Beine zu helfen. Beschämt über ihre eigene Schwäche verlassen sie das Medicae-Deck und schlurfen resigniert auf ihre Stationen.
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

languages.text: Les officiers sont trop épuisés. À voir leur mine défaite et leurs épaules affaissées, il est flagrant que chaque mot prononcé par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} les enfonce un peu plus dans le désespoir au lieu de les encourager. Honteux de leur propre faiblesse, ils quittent le pont medicae pour retourner à leurs postes, l'air résigné.
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

traits.locale_text: Les officiers sont trop épuisés. À voir leur mine défaite et leurs épaules affaissées, il est flagrant que chaque mot prononcé par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} les enfonce un peu plus dans le désespoir au lieu de les encourager. Honteux de leur propre faiblesse, ils quittent le pont medicae pour retourner à leurs postes, l'air résigné.

languages.text: Subaylar fevkalade bitkin. Düşmüş yüzleri ve kambur duruşlarından, Lord Kaptan'ın söylediği her kelime ile yüreklenmeleri gerekirken ruhlarının kaya gibi ezildiğini söylemek güç değil. Kendi zayıflıklarından utanarak sıhhiye güvertesinden ayrılıyor ve başlarına gelenlere boyun eğerek görev yerlerine gidiyorlar.
languages.original_text: The officers are too exhausted. It's easy to tell by their fallen faces and hunched shoulders that each word the Lord Captain says crushes their spirit like a rock rather than helping it soar. Ashamed of their own weakness, they leave the medicae deck and shuffle off to their stations in resignation.

traits.locale_text: Subaylar fevkalade bitkin. Düşmüş yüzleri ve kambur duruşlarından, Lord Kaptan'ın söylediği her kelime ile yüreklenmeleri gerekirken ruhlarının kaya gibi ezildiğini söylemek güç değil. Kendi zayıflıklarından utanarak sıhhiye güvertesinden ayrılıyor ve başlarına gelenlere boyun eğerek görev yerlerine gidiyorlar.
